snippet.title: Brick Breaker/Breaker, The (Dro Soft/Juliet Software) (1987) (Amstrad CPC)
snippet.description:
(Scroll down for English Description)
Situémonos en la linea “espacio-temporal” de este juego. 

Estamos en 1987, en plena explosión de la fiebre “Arkanoid”, con juegazos como la conversión del mismo, o Batty, y van esta gente, y hacen un juego que parece el Breakout original, con la “friolera” de 15 niveles y fisicas de espanto.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Let us place ourselves in the "space-time" line of this game. 

We are in 1987, with the "Arkanoid" fever exploding, which leads to a great conversion from the Arcade made by Ocean and some awesome clones such as Batty. 
Juliet Software released, a Breakout clone!, that looks like the original with 15 different levels and some items.
